node.hospital_zh: 雅麗氏何妙齡那打素醫院
node.hospital_en: Alice Ho Miu Ling Nethersole Hospital
node.detail_zh: 患者任職公司司機，亦是兼職的士司機，有長期病患，無外遊記錄。7 月 14 日開始喉嚨痛。
node.detail_en: The patient is the father of patient #1638, who works as a company driver as well as part-time taxi driver. He has underlying health conditions and no travel history, and developed sore throat on July 14.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Ha Hang Village, Ting Kok Road
